org.openntf.formula.ast

Interface Node

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ASTNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ASTAssignment, ASTAtConCat, ASTAtDo, ASTAtDoWhile, ASTAtEval, ASTAtEvalEx, ASTAtFocEval, ASTAtFor, ASTAtIf, ASTAtIfError, ASTAtIsAvailable, ASTAtIsError, ASTAtIsUnavailable, ASTAtReturn, ASTAtSort, ASTAtText, ASTAtTransform, ASTAtWhile, ASTFocNormalText, ASTFocParam, ASTFunction, ASTGetVariable, ASTOperator, ASTSelect, ASTSubscript, ASTUserDefinedFunction, ASTUserDefinedFunctionDef, ASTUserDefinedFunctionParameter, ASTUserDefinedFunctionVariable, ASTUserDefinedInclude, ASTValueDateOrKW, ASTValueDouble, ASTValueInt, ASTValueList, ASTValueString, SimpleNode

    public interface Node
extends ASTNode

    • Method Detail

      • jjtOpen

        void jjtOpen()
        This method is called after the node has been made the current node. It indicates that child nodes can now be added to it.

      • jjtClose

        void jjtClose()

      • jjtSetParent

        void jjtSetParent(Node n)
        set a new parent to the current node

      • jjtGetParent

        Node jjtGetParent()
        Return the parent of the current node

      • jjtAddChild

        void jjtAddChild(Node n,
                 int i)
        This method tells the node to add its argument to the node's list of children.

      • jjtGetChild

        Node jjtGetChild(int i)
        This method returns a child node. The children are numbered from zero, left to right.

      • jjtGetNumChildren

        int jjtGetNumChildren()
        Return the number of children the node has.

              throws FormulaReturnException
